name: Starfall
description:
Story

Starfall is a 2D, sidescrolling platform game where you follow a young Star Seeker named Atlus to a distant planet to collect fallen stars.

The world is treacherous and filled with Golems, statue-like creatures that are not fond of outsiders.

With the half encouraging words of Maia in your ear, who sits million of light-years away, join Atlus as he seeks out these fallen stars.

Features 

  • Action Platformer
  • Challenging bosses
  • Character upgrades

Keyboard Controls

  • Arrows to move
  • Z/Space to jump
  • X to attack
  • D/Page Down to swap weapon
  • Shift to Dash (when available)

Controller Xbox

  • D-Pad/Joystick to move
  • A to jump
  • X to attack
  • Y to swap weapon
  • RB to Dash (when available)

F4 to fullscreen
